l29JA2paBSRjRKZb.description: Effect: Choose one of the following benefits:

system.story: You dare mock Blunwin Mousebane? You think my deed trivial? Ah, but you didn’t see the size of the mouse!

prerequisites.value: You defeat a leader or solo creature with a Reason score of −2 or lower, such as an arixx.
